divs: Sighting DetailsI was hot inside my apartmenwoutside to cool off was walking around the binack of my apartment when I noticed an Orange glow it was in the golf hovering in the golf it made me feel scared I didn't go to sleep till six incourse located behind my apartment nothad a humming sound I felt it kmore than I heard it other than that was it was one orb that turned into three it happened quite quickly then all three orbs came back together and the object took off Really fast like a blink off an eye t
